sentences.en: A grasshopper can leap over obstacles 500 times its own height.
sentences.cn: 蚱蜢能跳过自己身高500倍的障碍物.

sentences.en: A: How can you eat that grasshopper? It doesn't make you sick?
sentences.cn: 你怎麽吃得下那只蚱蜢? 你不觉得恶心 吗 ?

sentences.en: Charles started reading when he was knee - high to a grasshopper.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯在很小的时候就开始读书了.

sentences.en: Did you use Clive as a golf ball? asked the grasshopper.
sentences.cn: “你是不是把克莱夫当作高尔夫球了? ”蚱蜢问道.

sentences.en: He gave their crops to the grasshopper, their produce to the locust.
sentences.cn: 把他们的土产交给蚂蚱, 把他们辛苦得来的交给蝗虫.

sentences.en: He thought he had made an end of the little grasshopper.
sentences.cn: 他以为把那个小蚱蜢干掉了.

sentences.en: I haven't seen you since you were knee - high to a grasshopper!
sentences.cn: 我上次见你你还是个小不点呢!

sentences.en: I remember that it was summer. I had just come inside from catching grasshoppers and I was sorting them on my sister's bed because I didn't want to get grasshopper guts on mine.
sentences.cn: 我记得那是夏天，我抓了些蝗虫放到妹妹的床上，根据它们还剩下几只脚来归类，有些蝗虫的内脏都冒出来了，我当然不想弄到自己的床上。

sentences.en: I've known him since he was knee - high to a grasshopper.
sentences.cn: 他很小的时候我就认识他了.

sentences.en: It is the Cricket and Grasshopper Kingdoms that address you today.
sentences.cn: 今天是蟋蟀和蚱蜢王国向你们讲话.

sentences.en: Moreover , GRASSHOPPER is also the agent of many famous cabinet and hardware companies in east Europe.
sentences.cn: GRASSHOPPER同时还是许多欧洲知名的橱卫五金的东欧代理商.

sentences.en: One day a grasshopper came upon an ant at work in a garden.
sentences.cn: 一天， 蚱蜢碰到了一只正在花园里干活的蚂蚁。

sentences.en: So the grasshopper was the one spreading the nasty rumours.
sentences.cn: 原来蚱蜢就是那个散布这个令人讨厌的谣言的人啊!

sentences.en: The grasshopper was right. You really are a horrible little boy.
sentences.cn: “蚱蜢说的对. 你确实是个讨厌的小孩. ”

sentences.en: The mantis and grasshopper are small animals in the field.
sentences.cn: 螳螂和蚱蜢是田地里的小动物.

sentences.en: Then put in a grasshopper and see how the mantis eats it.
sentences.cn: 然后放进一只蚱蜢,观察螳螂怎样吃了蚱蜢.

sentences.en: You don't think. The grasshopper went and sat down.
sentences.cn: “你没想过. ”蚱蜢走到座位坐了下来.

words.tran_cn: 蚱蜢；[植保]蝗虫；小型侦察机

trans.tran_cn: 蚱蜢，蝗虫，蚂蚱，[空]小型侦察机
trans.tran_en: an insect that has long back legs for jumping and that makes short loud noises
